typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		STORE_ID as string,
		WAREHOUSE_ID as string,
		WAREHOUSE_NAME as string,
		WAREHOUSE_COUNTRY as string,
		WAREHOUSE_STATE as string,
		WAREHOUSE_CITY as string,
		WAREHOUSE_STREET_NUMBER as string,
		WAREHOUSE_STREET_NAME as string,
		WAREHOUSE_STREET_TYPE as string,
		WAREHOUSE_ZIP as string,
		STORE_NAME as string,
		STORE_COUNTRY as string,
		STORE_COUNTY as string,
		STORE_STATE as string,
		STORE_CITY as string,
		STORE_STREET_NUMBER as string,
		STORE_STREET_NAME as string,
		STORE_ZIP as string,
		NUMBER_EMPLOYEES as string,
		WORKING_HOURS as string,
		MANAGER_NAME as string,
		SALES_PERSON_ID as string,
		SALES_PERSON_TYP as string,
		SALES_PERSON_TITLE as string,
		SALES_PERSON_FIRST_NAME as string,
		SALES_PERSON_LAST_NAME as string,
		SALES_PERSON_SUFFIX as string,
		SALES_PERSON_EMAIL_ADDRESS as string,
		SALES_PERSON_PHONE_NUMBER as string,
		SALES_PERSON_PHONE_NUMBER_TYPE as string,
		SALES_QUOTA as string,
		SALES_PERSON_BONUS as string,
		COMMISSION_PCT as string,
		SALES_YTD as string,
		SALES_LAST_YEAR as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> HubStoreWarehouse
source(output(
		HK_L_STORE_WAREHOUSE as binary,
		HK_STORE_ID as binary,
		HK_WAREHOUSE_ID as binary,
		LOAD_DTS as timestamp,
		REC_SRC as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> StoreWarehouseSource
HubStoreWarehouse select(mapColumn(
		STORE_ID,
		WAREHOUSE_ID
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectTransformation
SelectTransformation derive(LOAD_DTS = currentTimestamp(),
		REC_SRC = 'StoreWarehouse_Info',
		HK_STORE_WAREHOUSE = md5Binary(concat(STORE_ID,WAREHOUSE_ID)),
		HK_STORE_ID = md5Binary(STORE_ID),
		HK_WAREHOUSE_ID = md5Binary(WAREHOUSE_ID)) ~> DataConversion
DataConversion, StoreWarehouseSource exists(DataConversion@HK_STORE_ID == StoreWarehouseSource@HK_STORE_ID
	&& DataConversion@HK_WAREHOUSE_ID == StoreWarehouseSource@HK_WAREHOUSE_ID,
	negate:true,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> OnlyNewRecords
OnlyNewRecords sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		HK_L_STORE_WAREHOUSE as binary,
		HK_STORE_ID as binary,
		HK_WAREHOUSE_ID as binary,
		LOAD_DTS as timestamp,
		REC_SRC as string
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError',
	mapColumn(
		HK_L_STORE_WAREHOUSE = HK_STORE_WAREHOUSE,
		HK_STORE_ID,
		HK_WAREHOUSE_ID,
		LOAD_DTS,
		REC_SRC
	)) ~> StoreWarehouse

source(output(
		customer_id as string,
		salutation as string,
		first_name as string,
		last_name as string,
		dob as date,
		birth_country as string,
		email_address as string,
		phone_number as string,
		phone_number_type as string,
		address_id as string,
		country as string,
		county as string,
		state as string,
		city as string,
		street_number as string,
		street_name as string,
		zip as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> CustomerInfo
source(output(
		HK_CUSTOMER_ID as binary,
		CUSTOMER_ID as string,
		LOAD_DTS as timestamp,
		REC_SRC as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> HubCustomerSource
CustomerInfo select(mapColumn(
		customer_id
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectTransformation
SelectTransformation derive(HK_CUSTOMER_ID = md5(customer_id),
		REC_SRC = "Customer_Info",
		Datetime = currentDate(),
		Cust_Id = customer_id) ~> DataConversion
DataConversion, HubCustomerSource exists(SelectTransformation@customer_id == HubCustomerSource@CUSTOMER_ID,
	negate:true,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> LoadNewRecordsOnly
LoadNewRecordsOnly sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		HK_CUSTOMER_ID as binary,
		CUSTOMER_ID as string,
		LOAD_DTS as timestamp,
		REC_SRC as string
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError',
	mapColumn(
		CUSTOMER_ID = Cust_Id,
		HK_CUSTOMER_ID,
		REC_SRC,
		LOAD_DTS = Datetime
	)) ~> HubCustomer

		STORE_ID as string,
		WAREHOUSE_ID as string,
		WAREHOUSE_NAME as string,
		WAREHOUSE_COUNTRY as string,
		WAREHOUSE_STATE as string,
		WAREHOUSE_CITY as string,
		WAREHOUSE_STREET_NUMBER as string,
		WAREHOUSE_STREET_NAME as string,
		WAREHOUSE_STREET_TYPE as string,
		WAREHOUSE_ZIP as string,
		STORE_NAME as string,
		STORE_COUNTRY as string,
		STORE_COUNTY as string,
		STORE_STATE as string,

		MANAGER_NAME as string,
		SALES_PERSON_ID as string,

	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,

source(output(
		HK_STORE_ID as binary,
		LOAD_DTS as timestamp,
		STORE_NAME as string,
		NUMBER_EMPLOYEES as integer,
		WORKING_HOURS as string,
		MANAGER_NAME as string,
		STREET_NUMBER as string,
		STREET_NAME as string,
		CITY as string,
		COUNTY as string,
		STATE as string,
		ZIP as string,
		COUNTRY as string,
		REC_SRC as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> SATStoreSource
SourceStore select(mapColumn(
		STORE_ID,
		STORE_NAME,
		NUMBER_EMPLOYEES,
		WORKING_HOURS,
		MANAGER_NAME,
		STORE_STREET_NUMBER,
		STORE_STREET_NAME,
		STORE_CITY,
		STORE_COUNTY,
		STORE_STATE,
		STORE_ZIP,
		STORE_COUNTRY
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectTransformation
SelectTransformation derive(HK_STORE_ID = md5Binary(STORE_ID),
		Datetime = currentDate(),
		RecordSource = "StoreInfo",
		Employees_count = toInteger(NUMBER_EMPLOYEES)) ~> DataConversion
DataConversion, SATStoreSource exists(SelectTransformation@STORE_NAME == SATStoreSource@STORE_NAME
	&& DataConversion@HK_STORE_ID == SATStoreSource@HK_STORE_ID
	&& Employees_count == SATStoreSource@NUMBER_EMPLOYEES
	&& SelectTransformation@MANAGER_NAME == SATStoreSource@MANAGER_NAME
	&& SelectTransformation@WORKING_HOURS == SATStoreSource@WORKING_HOURS
	&& STORE_STREET_NUMBER == STREET_NUMBER
	&& STORE_STREET_NAME == STREET_NAME
	&& STORE_CITY == CITY
	&& STORE_COUNTRY == COUNTY
	&& STORE_ZIP == ZIP,
	negate:true,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> LoadNewRecordsOnly
LoadNewRecordsOnly sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		HK_STORE_ID as binary,
		LOAD_DTS as timestamp,
		STORE_NAME as string,
		NUMBER_EMPLOYEES as integer,
		WORKING_HOURS as string,
		MANAGER_NAME as string,
		STREET_NUMBER as string,
		STREET_NAME as string,
		CITY as string,
		COUNTY as string,
		STATE as string,
		ZIP as string,
		COUNTRY as string,
		REC_SRC as string
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError',
	mapColumn(
		HK_STORE_ID,
		STORE_NAME,
		NUMBER_EMPLOYEES,
		WORKING_HOURS,
		MANAGER_NAME,
		STREET_NUMBER = STORE_STREET_NUMBER,
		STREET_NAME = STORE_STREET_NAME,
		CITY = STORE_CITY,
		COUNTY = STORE_COUNTY,
		STATE = STORE_STATE,
		ZIP = STORE_ZIP,
		HK_STORE_ID,
		LOAD_DTS = Datetime,
		REC_SRC = RecordSource,
		COUNTRY = STORE_COUNTRY
	)) ~> SatStore
